channel.title: [508] A list of things I need help with [508]
channel.description:
(If it's crossed out then someone helped me) *Note: You can also PM me how to do it.
[ul][list][li]How to make a Teleport command (with emote if can) [/li][li]How to make a Shop [/li][li]How to make NPC's talk (Not unless its the same as doing it in a 317 server then no need to help) [/li][li]How to change Home & Death Spawn.[/li][/list]
Thanks![/ul]
